00031         public function removeUploadedFile($fieldname,$filename) {
00032                 if(!t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('xajax')) {
00033                         return;
00034                         
00035                 }
00036                 
00037                  // Instantiate the tx_xajax_response object
00038                 require (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('xajax') . 'class.tx_xajax.php');
00039                 
00040         $objResponse = new tx_xajax_response();
00041                 
00042                 session_start();
00043                 
00044                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'])) {
00045                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'] as $field=>$files) {
00046                                 
00047                                 if(!strcmp($field,$fieldname)) {
00048                                         foreach($files as $key=>&$fileInfo) {
00049                                                 if(!strcmp($fileInfo['uploaded_name'],$filename)) {
00050                                                         unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field][$key]);
00051                                                 }
00052                                         }
00053                                 }
00054                         }
00055                 }
00056 
00057         // Add the content to or Result Box: #formResult
00058                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'])) {
00059                         $markers = array();
00060                         $this->fillFileMarkers($markers);
00061                         $content = $markers['###'.$fieldname.'_uploadedFiles###'];
00062                         $objResponse->addAssign("F3_MailformPlusPlus_UploadedFiles_".$fieldname, "innerHTML", $content);
00063                         
00064                 } else {
00065                         $objResponse->addAssign("F3_MailformPlusPlus_UploadedFiles_".$fieldname, "innerHTML", "");
00066                 }
00067 
00068         //return the XML response
00069         return $objResponse->getXML();
00070         }

00080         public function render($gp,$errors) {
00081                 
00082                 
00083                 session_start();
00084                 
00085                 //set GET/POST parameters
00086                 $this->gp = $gp;
00087                 
00088                 //set template
00089                 $this->template = $this->subparts['template'];
00090                 
00091                 //set settings
00092                 $this->settings = $this->parseSettings();
00093                 
00094                 $this->errors = $errors;
00095                 
00096                 //set language file
00097                 if(!$this->langFile) {
00098                         $this->readLangFile();
00099                 }
00100                 
00101                 
00102                 if(!$this->gp['submitted']) {
00103                         $this->storeStartEndBlock();
00104                 } else {
00105                         $this->fillStartEndBlock();
00106                 }
00107                 
00108                 //fill Typoscript markers
00109                 if(is_array($this->settings['markers.'])) {
00110                         $this->fillTypoScriptMarkers();
00111                 }
00112                 
00113                 //fill default markers
00114                 $this->fillDefaultMarkers();
00115                 
00116                 //fill value_[fieldname] markers
00117                 $this->fillValueMarkers();
00118                 
00119                 //fill selected_[fieldname]_value markers and checked_[fieldname]_value markers
00120                 $this->fillSelectedMarkers();
00121                 
00122                 //fill LLL:[language_key] markers
00123                 $this->fillLangMarkers();
00124                 
00125                 #print_r($this->template);
00126                 
00127                 //fill error_[fieldname] markers
00128                 if(!empty($errors)) {
00129                         $this->fillErrorMarkers($errors);
00130                 }
00131                 
00132                 //remove markers that were not substituted
00133                 $content = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($this->template);
00134                 
00135                 
00136                 return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00137         }

00144         protected function readLangFile() {
00145                 if(is_array($this->settings['langFile.'])) {
00146                         $this->langFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['langFile'],$this->settings['langFile.']);
00147                 } else {
00148                         $this->langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolveRelPathFromSiteRoot($this->settings['langFile']);
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         
00158         protected function storeStartEndBlock() {
00159                 session_start();
00160                 if(!isset($_SESSION['startblock'])) {
00161                         $_SESSION['startblock'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template, '###FORM_STARTBLOCK###');
00162                 }
00163                 if(!isset($_SESSION['endblock'])) {
00164                         $_SESSION['endblock'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template, '###FORM_ENDBLOCK###');
00165                 }
00166         }
00167         
00173         protected function fillStartEndBlock() {
00174                 session_start();
00175                 $markers['###FORM_STARTBLOCK###'] = $_SESSION['startblock'];
00176                 $markers['###FORM_ENDBLOCK###'] = $_SESSION['endblock'];
00177                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00178         }
00179         
00185         protected function parseSettings() {
00186                 $settings = $this->configuration->getSettings();
00187                 if(is_array($this->settings)) {
00188                         return $this->settings;
00189                 }
00190                 if($this->predefined) {
00191                         $settings = $settings['predef.'][$this->predefined];
00192                 }
00193                 session_start();
00194                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']) {
00195                         $settings = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'];
00196                 }
00197                 return $settings;
00198         }
00199         
00208         protected function fillSelectedMarkers() {
00209                 if (is_array($this->gp)) {
00210                         foreach($this->gp as $k=>$v) {
00211                                 if (is_array($v)) {
00212                                         foreach ($v as $field=>$value) {
00213                                                 $markers['###checked_'.$k.'_'.$value.'###'] = 'checked="checked"';
00214                                                 $markers['###selected_'.$k.'_'.$value.'###'] = 'selected="selected"';
00215                                         }
00216                                 } else {
00217                                         $markers['###checked_'.$k.'_'.$v.'###'] = 'checked="checked"';
00218                                         $markers['###selected_'.$k.'_'.$v.'###'] = 'selected="selected"';
00219                                 }
00220                         }
00221                         $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00222                 }
00223         }
00224         
00230         protected function fillDefaultMarkers() {
00231                 $settings = $this->parseSettings();
00232                 $markers = array();
00233                 $path = $this->pi_getPageLink($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00234                 $markers['###REL_URL###'] = $path;
00235                 $markers['###ABS_URL###'] = t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl('').$path;
00236                 $name = "step-1";
00237                 if($settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00238                         $name = $settings['formValuesPrefix']."[".$name."]";
00239                 }
00240                 $markers['###submit_reload###'] = ' name='.$name.'" ';
00241                 $this->fillCaptchaMarkers($markers);
00242                 $this->fillFEUserMarkers($markers);
00243                 $this->fillFileMarkers($markers);
00244                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00245         }

00253         protected function fillCaptchaMarkers(&$markers) {
00254                 global $LANG;
00255                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('captcha')){
00256                         $markers["###CAPTCHA###"] = '<img src="'.t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath('captcha').'captcha/captcha.php" alt="" />';
00257                         $markers["###captcha###"] = $markers['###CAPTCHA###'];
00258                 }
00259                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('simple_captcha')) {
00260                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('simple_captcha', 'class.tx_simplecaptcha.php'));
00261                         $simpleCaptcha_className = t3lib_div::makeInstanceClassName('tx_simplecaptcha');
00262                         $this->simpleCaptcha = new $simpleCaptcha_className();
00263                         $captcha = $this->simpleCaptcha->getCaptcha();
00264                         $markers["###simple_captcha###"] = $captcha;
00265                         $markers["###SIMPLE_CAPTCHA###"] = $captcha;
00266                 }
00267                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('sr_freecap')){
00268                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('sr_freecap').'pi2/class.tx_srfreecap_pi2.php');
00269                         $this->freeCap = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_srfreecap_pi2');
00270                         $markers = array_merge($markers,$this->freeCap->makeCaptcha());
00271                 }
00272                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('jm_recaptcha')) {
00273                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('jm_recaptcha')."class.tx_jmrecaptcha.php");
00274                         $this->recaptcha = new tx_jmrecaptcha();
00275                         $markers["###RECAPTCHA###"] = $this->recaptcha->getReCaptcha();
00276                         $markers["###recaptcha###"] = $markers['###RECAPTCHA###'];
00277                 }
00278                 
00279                 require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus')."Resources/PHP/mathguard/ClassMathGuard.php");
00280                 $langFile = "EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang.xml";
00281                 $question = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$langFile.':mathguard_question'));
00282                 $markers["###MATHGUARD###"] = MathGuard::returnQuestion($question,"red");
00283                 $markers["###mathguard###"] = $markers["###MATHGUARD###"];
00284         }

00292         protected function fillFEUserMarkers(&$markers) {
00293                 if (is_array($GLOBALS["TSFE"]->fe_user->user)) {
00294                         foreach($GLOBALS["TSFE"]->fe_user->user as $k=>$v) {
00295                                 $markers['###FEUSER_'.strtoupper($k).'###'] = $v;
00296                                 $markers['###FEUSER_'.strtolower($k).'###'] = $v;
00297                                 $markers['###feuser_'.strtoupper($k).'###'] = $v;
00298                                 $markers['###feuser_'.strtolower($k).'###'] = $v;
00299                         }
00300                 }
00301         }

00319         protected function fillFileMarkers(&$markers) {
00320                 session_start();
00321                 $settings = $this->parseSettings();
00322                 
00323                 //parse validation settings
00324                 if(is_array($settings['validators.'])) {
00325                         foreach($settings['validators.'] as $key=>$validatorSettings) {
00326                                 if(is_array($validatorSettings['config.']['fieldConf.'])) {
00327                                         foreach($validatorSettings['config.']['fieldConf.'] as $fieldname=>$fieldSettings) {
00328                                                 foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00329                                                         switch($check) {
00330                                                                 case "file_minSize":
00331                                                                         $minSize = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['minSize'];
00332                                                                         $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_minSize###"] = $minSize;
00333                                                                 break;
00334                                                                 case "file_maxSize":
00335                                                                         $maxSize = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['maxSize'];
00336                                                                         $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_maxSize###"] = $maxSize;
00337                                                                 break;
00338                                                                 case "file_allowedTypes":
00339                                                                         $types = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['allowedTypes'];
00340                                                                         $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_allowedTypes###"] = $types;
00341                                                                 break;
00342                                                                 case "file_maxCount":
00343                                                                         $maxCount = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['maxCount'];
00344                                                                         $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_maxCount###"] = $maxCount;
00345                                                                         
00346                                                                         $fileCount = count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][str_replace(".","",$fieldname)]);
00347                                                                         $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_fileCount###"] = $fileCount;
00348                                                                         
00349                                                                         $remaining = $maxCount - $fileCount;
00350                                                                         $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_remainingCount###"] = $remaining;
00351                                                                 break;
00352                                                                 case "required":
00353                                                                         $markers['###required_'.str_replace(".","",$fieldname).'###'] = (isset($settings['requiredSign']))?$settings['requiredSign']:"*";
00354                                                                 break;
00355                                                         }
00356                                                 }
00357                                         }
00358                                 }
00359                         }
00360                 }
00361                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'])) {
00362                         $singleWrap = $settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00363                         $totalMarkerSingleWrap = $settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00364                         $totalWrap = $settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00365                         $totalMarkersTotalWrap = $settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00366                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'] as $field=>$files) {
00367                                 foreach($files as $fileInfo) {
00368                                         $filename = $fileInfo['name'];
00369                                         if(t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('xajax') && $settings['files.']['enableAjaxFileRemoval']) {
00370                                                 $filename .= '<a href="javascript:void" class="mailformplusplus_removelink" onclick="xajax_'.$this->prefixId.'_removeUploadedFile(\''.$field.'\',\''.$fileInfo['uploaded_name'].'\')">X</a>';
00371                                         }
00372                                         if(strlen($singleWrap) > 0 && strstr($singleWrap,"|")) {
00373                                                 $wrappedFilename = str_replace("|",$filename,$singleWrap);
00374                                         } else {
00375                                                 $wrappedFilename = $filename;
00376                                         }
00377                                         $markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'] .= $wrappedFilename;
00378                                         
00379                                         if(strlen($totalMarkerSingleWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalMarkerSingleWrap,"|")) {
00380                                                 $wrappedFilename = str_replace("|",$filename,$totalMarkerSingleWrap);
00381                                         } else {
00382                                                 $wrappedFilename = $filename;
00383                                         }
00384                                         $markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'] .= $wrappedFilename;
00385                                         
00386                                         
00387                                 }
00388                                 if(strlen($totalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalWrap,"|")) {
00389                                         $markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'] = str_replace("|",$markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'],$totalWrap);
00390                                 }
00391                                 $markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'] = '<div id="F3_MailformPlusPlus_UploadedFiles_'.$field.'">'.$markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'].'</div>';
00392                         }
00393                         if(strlen($totalMarkersTotalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalMarkersTotalWrap,"|")) {
00394                                 $markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'] = str_replace("|",$markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'],$totalMarkersTotalWrap);
00395                         }
00396                         $markers['###TOTAL_UPLOADEDFILES###'] = $markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'];
00397                 }
00398         }

00408         protected function fillErrorMarkers(&$errors) {
00409                 $markers = array();
00410                 $singleWrap = $this->settings['singleErrorTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00411                 foreach($errors as $field=>$types) {
00412                         $errorMessages = array();
00413                         $clearErrorMessages = array();
00414                         if(strlen(trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field))) > 0) {
00415                                 $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field));
00416                                 if($errorMessage) {
00417                                         if(strlen($singleWrap) > 0 && strstr($singleWrap,"|")) {
00418                                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$singleWrap);
00419                                         }
00420                                         
00421                                         $errorMessages[] = $errorMessage;
00422                                 }
00423                         }
00424                         if(!is_array($types)) {
00425                                 $types = array($types);
00426                         }
00427                         foreach($types as $type) {
00428                                 
00429                                 $temp = explode(";",$type);
00430                                 $type = array_shift($temp);
00431                                 foreach($temp as $item) {
00432                                         $item = explode("::",$item);
00433                                         $values[$item[0]] = $item[1];
00434                                 }
00435                                 
00436                                 //try to load specific error message with key like error_fieldname_integer
00437                                 $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field.'_'.$type));
00438                                 if(strlen($errorMessage) == 0) {
00439                                         $type = strtolower($type);
00440                                         $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field.'_'.$type));
00441                                 }
00442                                 if($errorMessage) {
00443                                         if(is_array($values)) {
00444                                                 foreach($values as $key=>$value) {
00445                                                         $errorMessage = str_replace("###".$key."###",$value,$errorMessage);
00446                                                 }
00447                                         }
00448                                         if(strlen($singleWrap) > 0 && strstr($singleWrap,"|")) {
00449                                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$singleWrap);
00450                                         }
00451                                         $errorMessages[] = $errorMessage;
00452                                 } else {
00453                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Could not find error Message with key \"error_".$field."_".$type."\"!",false);
00454                                 }
00455                         }
00456                         $errorMessage = implode("",$errorMessages);
00457                         $totalWrap = $this->settings['singleErrorTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00458                         if(strlen($totalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalWrap,"|")) {
00459                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$totalWrap);
00460                         }
00461                         $clearErrorMessage = $errorMessage;
00462                         if($this->settings['addErrorAnchors']) {
00463                                 $errorMessage = '<a name="'.$field.'">'.$errorMessage.'</a>';
00464                                 
00465                         } 
00466                         $markers['###error_'.$field.'###'] = $errorMessage;
00467                         $markers['###ERROR_'.strtoupper($field).'###'] = $errorMessage;
00468                         $errorMessage = $clearErrorMessage;
00469                         if($this->settings['addErrorAnchors']) {
00470                                 $errorMessage = '<a href="' . t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REQUEST_URI') . '#'.$field.'">'.$errorMessage.'</a>';
00471                                 
00472                         } 
00473                         //list settings
00474                         $listSingleWrap = $this->settings['errorListTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00475                         if(strlen($listSingleWrap) > 0 && strstr($listSingleWrap,"|")) {
00476                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$listSingleWrap);
00477                         }
00478                         
00479                         $markers['###ERROR###'] .= $errorMessage;
00480                 }
00481                 $totalWrap = $this->settings['errorListTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00482                 if(strlen($totalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalWrap,"|")) {
00483                         $markers['###ERROR###'] = str_replace("|",$markers['###ERROR###'],$totalWrap);
00484                 }
00485                 
00486                 $markers['###error###'] = $markers['###ERROR###'];
00487                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00488         }

00495         protected function fillTypoScriptMarkers() {
00496                 $markers = array();
00497                 foreach($this->settings['markers.'] as $name=>$options) {
00498                         if(!strstr($name,".")) {
00499                                 if(!strcmp($options,"USER") || !strcmp($options,"USER_INT")) {
00500                                         $this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.']['gp'] = $this->gp;
00501                                         $markers['###'.$name.'###'] = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.']['userFunc'],$this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.'],$this,"");
00502                                 } else {
00503                                         $markers['###'.$name.'###'] = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['markers.'][$name],$this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.']);
00504                                 }
00505                         }
00506                 }
00507                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00508         }
00509         
00520         protected function fillValueMarkers() {
00521                 $markers = array();
00522                 if (is_array($this->gp)) {
00523                         foreach($this->gp as $k=>$v) {
00524                                 if (!ereg('EMAIL_', $k)) {
00525                                         if (is_array($v)) {
00526                                                 $v = implode(',', $v);
00527                                         }
00528                                         $v = trim($v);
00529                                         if ($v != "") {
00530                                                 if(get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00531                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = stripslashes(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v));
00532                                                 } else {
00533                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v);
00534                                                 }
00535                                         } else {
00536                                                 $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = '';
00537                                         }
00538                                         $markers['###'.$k.'###'] = $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'];
00539                                         $markers['###'.strtoupper($k).'###'] = $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'];
00540                                         $markers['###'.strtoupper("VALUE_".$k).'###'] = $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'];
00541                                 } //if end
00542                         } // foreach end
00543                 } // if end
00544                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00545         }
00546         
00554         protected function fillLangMarkers() {
00555                 global $LANG;
00556                 $langMarkers = array();
00557                 if ($this->langFile != '') {
00558                         $aLLMarkerList = array();
00559                         preg_match_all('/###LLL:.+?###/Ssm', $this->template, $aLLMarkerList);
00560                         foreach($aLLMarkerList[0] as $LLMarker){
00561                                 $llKey =  strtolower(substr($LLMarker,7,strlen($LLMarker)-10));
00562                                 $marker = $llKey;
00563                                 $langMarkers['###LLL:'.$marker.'###'] = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':'.$llKey));
00564                                 $langMarkers['###LLL:'.strtoupper($marker).'###'] = $langMarkers['###LLL:'.$marker.'###'];
00565                         }
00566                 }
00567             $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $langMarkers);
00568         }
00569 }
